p: The identified DNA synthesis inhibitors (for example, gemcitabine hydrochloride, 23) those were active against at least one coronavirus, suggest that these drugs have potential as antiviral therapy against coronaviruses. Toremifene citrate ( 25) is an estrogen receptor 1 antagonist that inhibits both MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV with EC 50 of 12.9 and 11.97 μM. respectively.
